meanings.definition: A type of sweet dessert made from cream
meanings.sent1: I love to indulge in creamy creme desserts after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a delicious creme brulee for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The creme cake was so tempting that I couldn't resist having a second slice.
meanings.sent4: Her creme dessert was a heavenly treat for her taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The creme pie was so rich and creamy, it melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic preparation used for moisturizing the skin
meanings.sent1: After washing her face, she applied a gentle creme to keep her skin soft.
meanings.sent2: The creme she used had a pleasant scent and left her skin feeling smooth.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the creme made her look like a shiny disco ball.
meanings.sent4: The creme worked like magic, transforming her dry skin into a hydrated canvas.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious creme felt like a soothing balm on her tired skin.

meanings.definition: A thick, sweet liquid made from sugar and water
meanings.sent1: The creme for the dessert was a perfect blend of sugar and water.
meanings.sent2: He poured the warm creme over the freshly baked pastries.
meanings.sent3: The creme was so sweet that it made her teeth ache.
meanings.sent4: The golden creme flowed smoothly, adding a touch of sweetness to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The sugary creme was like a golden river of sweetness on the plate.
